about_the_game:
It’s time to dive into the mysterious atmosphere and tickle your neural cells along with an intriguing investigation "City Legends: The Ghost of Misty Hill DLC"! Additional spine-chilling locations and inaccessible corners of the Misty Hill Treatment Center will help you to learn more about the history of the institution and its residents. Do you believe that ghosts don't just exist, but can take you with them? Not only you have to be very careful investigating this case, but you also have to protect your soul! Your enemy may be waiting for you around the next corner, be warned!

The detective horror continues with the additional content "City Legends: The Ghost of Misty Hill DLC" with the dark secrets, dangerous situations and thrilling investigation!

🌆 FIND OUT A SECRET ROOM!
Sometimes they don’t go away, staying trapped between the two worlds. Can you become friends with the supernatural? Find the secret room and play a stimulating board game with Laura!

🌆 DISCOVER THE DARK SECRET!
What mystery is Dr. Noel hiding? Occult practices have never been good…

🌆 FIND THE LAST BOOK!
Solve mysterious formulas, learn how to make liquid key and find the last book written by your friend Michael!

🌆 EXPLORE THE CAUSES OF DEATH IN THE THEATER!
Study the records of the theater workers and find out the terrible secret that lurks within its walls!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7/Windows 8/Windows 10
  • Processor: 1.7 GHz
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 1200 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7/Windows 8/Windows 10
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 1200 MB available space

short_description: The doors of medical institutions often hide terrible secrets and outrageous accidents. Don't let ghosts get in the way between you and your search for answers!
supported_languages:
English*, French, German, Russian
*languages with full audio support
